headline.main: DATA ON MARIJUANA HINT AT SOME PERIL

docs.abstract: Preliminary rept from new Fed study raises possibility that marijuana may be more harmful than has been assumed; effects reptdly could include birth defects or lessened resistance to disease (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: Preliminary data from a new Government study raise the possibility that marijuana may be more harmful than has been thought, the research director of the National Institute of Drug Abuse said today.
docs.snippet: Preliminary data from a new Government study raise the possibility that marijuana may be more harmful than has been thought, the research director of the National Institute of Drug Abuse said today.

headline.main: Federal Criticism of Effect Of Marijuana Reported Due

docs.abstract: NBC News repts that Fed Govt, changing its position on health dangers of smoking marijuana, plans to issue 1st serious warnings about potential physical effects; says new repts are expected to be much more critical of drug (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: Changing its position on the health dangers of smoking mariJuana, the Government plans to sue its first serious warning about its potential physical effects next week, according to a report on NBC Uews last night.
docs.snippet: Changing its position on the health dangers of smoking mariJuana, the Government plans to sue its first serious warning about its potential physical effects next week, according to a report on NBC Uews last night.
